newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australia's Costello says capex on target.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australia's Costello says capex on target.

text.p: Australian Treasurer Peter Costello said June quarter private new capital expenditure (capex) data released earlier on Thursday.

"The June quarter survey of investment expectations points to very strong growth in business investment in 1996/97 (July-June) and supports the budget forecast of 14 percent," Costello told parliament.
Capex data released earlier on Thursday showed a 16 percent rise in the June quarter, against economists' median expectations of a 2.0 percent rise.
"This is becoming a climate for investment," Costello said.
"We have now set up the situation for business to invest, there is now every confidence for consumers to spend," he said.
The official data showed estimates for capital expenditure in 1996/97 was A$39.48 billion, up 9.7 percent over the estimate made in the March quarter.
